summary: Adds a few character creation options to allow for the creation of a Khajiit that resembles a siamese house cat.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a few character creation options to allow for the creation of a Khajiit that resembles a siamese house cat.

Currently added is a warpaint option that adds points (dark fur) to the head and face, and two blue eyed options.
This mod does not change any of the body textures such as hands, feet, or tail, but that may come later.

Further development will be continued through the Steam Workshop.
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=7748

The eye texture is a modification of [url=file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url]; used with permission.

Screenshots taken using other mods including [url=file.php?id=5941]Coverkhajiits[/url].
author: Arizone
